0.1.name: wordpress/eshop-invoice
0.1.description:
This is a plugin to the eShop shopping cart plugin for WordPress (http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/eshop/). It includes:

  • PDF invoices using the excellent html2pdf library (http://html2pdf.fr/)

  • Customers "My Orders" view using a short code

  • Widget for displaying a link to the "My Orders" page

Documentation is available via PyPHP.be
